snippet.title: Monomyth - Early Access Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
MONOMYTH is an immersive, first-person dungeon-crawling RPG inspired by the genre's late classics. Embark on a journey through a vast and highly interactive game world as you unravel the mysteries hidden beneath the ancient fortress of Lysandria.

Wishlist Monomyth on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/908360/Monomyth/
Wishlist Monomyth on GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/monomyth
Follow Monomyth on X: https://twitter.com/rattower
Join the RatTower Discord Server: https://discord.gg/MPnz2Xy

Kickstarter Updates: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/836367155/monomyth/posts
